attributes.action: -Treat ALL People's Views Equally and Consider Them Equally No Matter Their AGE!
attributes.additional_details:
-Youth voice refers to the distinct ideas, opinions, attitudes, knowledge, and actions of young people as a collective body allowing them to take control off their future!
-Everyone should have opportunities that are equally because anyone can have their life cut short at any moment and we don't know what the future will look like so give everyone opportunities to control their potential future life!
-Why isn't it enough to want to vote as to the fact that it should be counted?
-Equality Is Key!
attributes.background:
-Treating all peoples views equally is extremely important!
-We should all fight for each others voices to be heard!
-This petition isn't just for the youth of today but all ages to have equal opportunities!
-Its Young People's futures that your handling so consider their views!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/265932
